danata paswani shreniye di pawathwana shishyathwa wibhagaya hathwani shreniye di pawathwiya yuthu bawata jathika adhyapana panatha ha prathipaththiya sakas kirime upadeshaka karaka sabhawata yojana idiripath wi athayi adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha kiyayi.paswani shreniye di pawathwana shishyathwa wibhagaya awurudu dahayak wani wayasaka sitina daruwanta wishala barak ha manasika wadayak wi athi bawath jiwa widyathmakawa ema wayasa mewani pidakari wibhagayak sandaha ayogya bawath ema karaka sabhawata karunu dakwa thibena waidyawarun, adhyapana wisheshagnyayan saha adhyapana widya pita mahacharyawarun penwa di athayi da amathiwaraya pawasiya.paswani shreniye igenuma labana dasa hawiridi wiye daruwaku pasuwanne sankramanika awasthawaka wuwath hathwani shreniye di dolos hawiridi wiye daruwaku sithima gana awadhanaya yomu wana wayasaka pasuwana bawin shishyathwa wibhagaya ema wayase di pawathwima wada yogya baw widwath piris sandahan kara athi bawa da amathiwaraya wadiduratath kiya.kese wethath wathman shishyathwa wibhagayen wishayayakata lakunu thispaha bagin wishayayan dekakata lakunu haththawak laba ganna sisunta ema wibhagaya samath bawata sahathikayak nikuth kirima, mewara shishyathwa wibhagaya samath sisunta ema sahathika uthsawakarayen pirinamima wani wadasatahan ma¼ngin shishyathwa wibhagaya sisunta sith ganna wibhagayak bawata pathkirima pinisa aithihasika uthsahayak ganu labuwe palamuwarata bawath amathiwaraya pawasiya..

(wathman libiyawa) dewani loka yudha samayedi ha in perada libiyawedi ha ithiyopiyawedi musolinige hamudawa wisin boho wita swadeshikayanta pahara dima sandaha yuddha tanki, guwan yana ha mastard wayu da,(rasayanika wisha wayuwak) bhawitha karana ladi. 1929 - 1933 athara kalayedi ithaliyanu pasistwadin wisin yatath wijitha libiyawe nasi -yudew samula ghathanayata pera deshanapalana sirakaruwan randawa thabana wada kandawuru idikarana ladi.

kaෲs (barfi)hondama nawaka naluwa - aayushman kurana(wiki donar)hondama nawaka adhyakshanaya - gauri shinde (inglish winglish)hondama gayakaya - aayushman kurana(jani da rang ha wiki donar)hondama gayikawa - shalmali khoged(pareshan, ishaksade)hondama sangitha adhyakshawaraya - pritham (barfi)hondama githa rachanaya - gulsar (jab thak haiyi jan hi chala githaya)yawajiwa sammanayen pidum labuwe nasigiya yash chopra sinamawediyayi.*
